name: VNRecognizeAnimalsRequest
desc: A request that recognizes animals in an image.

items.name: var results: [VNRecognizedObjectObservation]?
items.desc: The results of the request to recognize animals.

items.name: func supportedIdentifiers() -> [VNAnimalIdentifier]
items.desc: Returns the identifiers of the animals that the request detects.

items.name: let VNRecognizeAnimalsRequestRevision2: Int
items.desc: Revision 2 of the animal recognition algorithm.

items.name: let VNRecognizeAnimalsRequestRevision1: Int
items.desc: Revision 1 of the animal recognition algorithm.
